mapper.sql: BILL_ID, STORE_ID, BILL_CODE, BILL_TYPE, BILL_CREATE_USER_ID, BILL_DEPT_ID, BILL_CREATE_TIME, BILL_CONFIRM_USER_ID, BILL_CONFIRM_TIME, BILL_TAKE_USER_ID, BILL_TAKE_DEPT_ID, BILL_TAKE_TIME, BILL_REMARK,BILL_CREATE_USER_NAME,BILL_CONFIRM_USER_NAME,BILL_TAKE_USER_NAME, BILL_DEPT_NAME,BILL_TAKE_DEPT_NAME,STORE_NAME
mapper.delete: delete from GQJ_MATERIAL_BILL where BILL_ID in (${ids})
mapper.insert:
select GQJ_MATERIAL_BILL_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into GQJ_MATERIAL_BILL
BILL_ID,
STORE_ID,
BILL_CODE,
BILL_TYPE,
BILL_CREATE_USER_ID,
BILL_DEPT_ID,
BILL_CREATE_TIME,
BILL_CONFIRM_USER_ID,
BILL_CONFIRM_TIME,
BILL_TAKE_USER_ID,
BILL_TAKE_DEPT_ID,
BILL_TAKE_TIME,
BILL_REMARK,
#{billId},
#{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{billType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{billCreateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{billDeptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{billCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{billConfirmUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{billConfirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{billTakeUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{billRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update GQJ_MATERIAL_BILL
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_CODE = #{billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_TYPE = #{billType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_CREATE_USER_ID = #{billCreateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_DEPT_ID = #{billDeptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_CREATE_TIME = #{billCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BILL_CONFIRM_USER_ID = #{billConfirmUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_CONFIRM_TIME = #{billConfirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BILL_TAKE_USER_ID = #{billTakeUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_TAKE_DEPT_ID = #{billTakeDeptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_TAKE_TIME = #{billTakeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BILL_REMARK = #{billRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BILL_ID = #{billId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
